actionCalls.description: Apex Action that deserializes JSON data and outputs into variables

decisions.name: decision_Is_Anonymous_Donor_or_Awaiting_NPC_ID
decisions.label: Is Anonymous Donor or Awaiting NPC ID?

Flow.description: Upsert unified Donr records from Data Cloud into NPC

formulas.description: If LastName and Email blank, use Anon Donor
formulas.name: formula_AccountIdToUse
formula_GiftTransactionPaymentMethod
formulas.expression: CASE({!apxc_Extract_GiftTransactionsCopy.value4}, "apple_pay", "ApplePay", "card", "Credit/debit card","ee_uk","SMS","google_pay","Google Pay","o2_uk","SMS","sky_uk","SMS","three_uk","SMS","virgin_uk","SMS","vodafone_uk","SMS","Cash","Cash","Charity Voucher","Charity Voucher","Cheque","Cheque","Credit/ Debit Cards","Credit/debit card","Direct Debits","Direct Debit","PayPal","PayPal","Payroll Giving","Payroll Giving","Unknown")

formulas.description: If First Name, Last Name, Email Address, Postcode, and Phone Number are empty, the donor is anonymous
formulas.name: formula_IndividualAnonDonor

formulas.description: If PhoneNumber field is length 9, 11, or 12, use this value, else ignore
formulas.name: formula_IndividualPhoneNumber

formulas.description: Last Name + Email + Phone + Postcode is empty, it's Anonymous
formulas.name: formula_IsGTAnonymousDonor

Flow.interviewLabel: Data Cloud - Upsert Records Donr (Unified) v2 {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Data Cloud - Upsert Records Donr (Unified) v2
